attributes.additional_details: Use every means you have to hand to persuade all members of all parties to Include and foster active participation for disabled people in every aspect of public life.  Second-class citiizenship should be no longer a factor in the public and political lives of the citizens of this country.  Never Again should it feature in the legislation policies or political attitudes of those assembled to represent All People in their consituencies - not just those with Capacity or Clout to make their persuasions impact on the rest of us.
